"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598d3986368722490000bcf#post_5598d3986368722490000bcf

I adore ASMR! Who are your favorites?


"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598d37f6368720ef90010c4#post_5598d37f6368720ef90010c4

Weird shit happened at my school. That school treated me well.

My freshman year, someone tried to commit suicide. They jumped from two stories. A few kids saw him fall, and were immediately ushered to student services. We were put into lockdown for two hours. Without phone access, a lot of us thought that there was a bomb threat. Scary stuff.

I was lucky. No cliques at my school whatsoever. A few typical jackasses, but when you attended a school right next to one of the biggest private schools in the state? It weeded out a lot of the preps and jocks you see in a typical high school flick.

We thought the place was deserted. It was lunch time and we were both looking to get off. So we pulled our pants down, lubed him up, he slammed my back against the wall and we went at it. It was really hot and really scary. Especially when my drama teacher came in. She didn't notice us but we didn't get to finish.

topics.body: My anthropology teacher has a few stories surrounding him, all of which he confirmed using physical and witness provided evidence. Like the time he charged down our sociology teacher with a to-scale whale penis. Or when he jumped out of the classroom window, climbed the tree next to the classroom, and screamed "free will!"

topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598d5356368725877000528#post_5598d5356368725877000528

It's SFW. Don't worry.

It's basically women (sometimes men) taking to you in soothing voices and trying to fill your ears with white noise (page crinkling, hair cutting, reading, painting, nail tapping, etc). It does wonders for anxiety and can help you fall asleep.


"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598d53c6368726a410015a6#post_5598d53c6368726a410015a6

Holy shit, how did your drama teacher not see you?
